message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.IOException' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.integration.InMemoryComponent'.
Abbreviation in name 'MRComponent' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
